name: King's Field: Dark Side Box
description:
In celebration of the 20th Anniversary of FromSoftware, Inc, the developers, decided to have a special release of the four King's Field games. This anniversary package was released only in Japan. The collector's box includes:
  • King's Field
  • King's Field II
  • King's Field III
  • King's Field IV: The Ancient City
  • "Memorial disc" historical DVD
  • Soundtrack CD
  • Folding printed map of the series' world.
  • Hardcover art book
  • Consolidated operating manual
The discs come in a multi-fold case with a simulated gold foil slip cover. The entire package comes in a sturdy box with a green marble texture print. King's Field 1-3 are PlayStation discs (which can be played on PS2). King's Field 4, like the original release, is PS2-only.
